p.codeblock: public abstract int registerMediaMetadataObserver(IMetadataObserver observer, int type);
public abstract int RegisterMediaMetadataObserver(IMetadataObserver observer, METADATA_TYPE type);
void registerMediaMetadataObserver( {required MetadataObserver observer, required MetadataType type});

section.title: Details
section.p: You need to implement the class and specify the metadata type in this method. This method enables you to add synchronized metadata in the video stream for more diversified live interactive streaming, such as sending shopping links, digital coupons, and online quizzes.
A successful call of this method triggers the callback.

pd.p: The metadata type. The SDK currently only supports . See .

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown; and you need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly.
